snippet.title: Decimate Drive - Wishlist Teaser
snippet.description:
Decimate Drive is an indie game which combines atmospheric horror with engaging gameplay, while taking inspiration from 70s & 80s car-themed horror movies.

You can now wishlist Decimate Drive on Steam. By wishlisting the game you'll be notified when it comes out. It's also a great way to support its development!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2427950/Decimate_Drive/
